Policy.acknowledgement_statement: INSTRUCTIONS: This study has not provided a suggested acknowledgement statement. However, Approved Users are expected to acknowledge the Submitting Investigator(s) who submitted data from the original study to an NIH-designated data repository, the primary funding organization that supported the Submitting Investigator(s), and the NIH-designated data repository (e.g., dbGaP). The acknowledgment statement should include the dbGaP accession number to the specific version of the dataset(s) analyzed.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Cancer in all age groups, other diseases in adults only, and methods
ConsentGroup.name: CADM
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: The informed consent document signed by the study participants allows use of these data by investigators for discovery and hypothesis generation in the investigation of the genetic contributions to cancer in all age groups and other diseases in adults only, as well as development of novel analytical approaches for GWAS.

ConsentGroup.title: Esophageal and stomach cancer
ConsentGroup.name: EGC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the dataset is limited to scientific research relating to esophageal and stomach cancer or methods research that could be used for esophageal or stomach cancer.
